page.title: 10BISHOP BURTON POST OFFICE
page.content: The shop/post office is open every week day from 9am to 6pm, on Saturday from 9am to 5pm and on Sunday from 10.30am to 2pm. Facilities available are:post office,banking, small general store, off license and dry cleaning. Many pensioners use the service for their weekly groceries and for collecting their pensions. The postmaster offers a grocery delivery service and operates a fruit and vegetable round. Despite some initial concern the Agricultural College student shop does not greatly affect trade. The proprietors provide an essential service for the village, especially for the old, housebound and infirm, who are not able to go shopping themselves. There is concern that the shop is becoming less viable and therefore be threatened with closure.
